name: Golfish
description:
LD46 Submission

Ever felt like a fish out of water being putt-putted into a large body of water? No? Well now you can with GolFISH.

Avoid the seagulls, utilise the oil slicks and sand pits to gold your fishy friend to salvation.

Source Code here: https://github.com/willoftw/FishyGolfer

Ludum Dare Submission: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/golfish
